titleStmt.title: Several new letters concerning the Jevves sent to divers Persons of Quality here in England, being a perfect relation of the miracles wrought by their prophet, the magnificence of their king, with the manner of his entertainment in the court of the Grand Signior.
titleStmt.author: Joseph, Hanie.

titleStmt.title: Several new letters concerning the Jevves sent to divers Persons of Quality here in England, being a perfect relation of the miracles wrought by their prophet, the magnificence of their king, with the manner of his entertainment in the court of the Grand Signior.
titleStmt.author: Joseph, Hanie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Maxwell for Robert Boulter,

notesStmt.note: "Copy of a letter from Gaza wrote by Hanie Joseph to his brother Raphel Joseph ..." -- p.[1].
Imperfect: pages stained and have print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
